messages.message: Can you point me where are you making this comparison?
Lets huddle I can share the screen
I’m looking at what `extract_markdown_metadata` returns. The size of `line_to_page` is not the same as the number of lines in `markdown_text`
thanks for looking into this @Rahul Rawal @Sławek Biel -- were you able to huddle to get on the same page?
Yes, Rahul helped me pinpoint the piece of code responsible. I’m working on a PR

Here’s the PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/54606)
@Kerry This was broken since the beginning and only happens if all of this is true:
• document was OCRed with Form Recognizer
• multistep model is used
• the document text after FR processing has a trailing endline (I think that happens when the last thing in the doc is a table)
That doesn’t qualify as backportable, does it?

:smile: i was about to send our a new announcement about backport guideline -- let's backport, the PR looks quite save and only improves the product quality; should be a straightforward backport too. thank you.
Waiting as well on backport guideline :slightly_smiling_face:
i reviewed and left a nit! thanks for the fix :raised_hands:
